Other Information.Test Conditions: Room temperature, blue LED irradiation (415 nm, 1 W)
Other Information.Additional Info: Photoreduction of MV2+ to MV•+ was observed.

Other Information.Test Conditions: Room temperature, blue LED irradiation (415 nm, 1 W)
Other Information.Additional Info: DQ2+ could not access encapsulated CdS QDs due to steric hindrance.

Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion based on molecular dimensions

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: MV2+ photoreduction efficiency increased with CdS QD loading; DQ2+ showed no photoreduction.

Other Information.Additional Info: Encapsulation achieved using 2-mercaptoimidazole as a capping agent, preserving the ZIF-8 structure.
